channel.title: Hiscores, John Please Help :p
channel.description:
Okay, I have my hiscores almost completely done. I just need at least 3 more things. [b]1[/b]: Search rank method.
[b]2[/b]: You know on row rowp stuff? Well, on the overall and skills pages, when it shows the players it only shows the first 2, row rowp1 and row rowp2, how would I make it go all the way to 22?
[b]3[/b]: When you click a skill on the left how do I make it where it's a different color, like when you're on overall, without using a new php file?
Hope you can help. :p Hiscores: http://sagescape.zapto.org (It redirects to 'em).

Okay, I have my hiscores almost completely done. I just need at least 3 more things.
1: Search rank method.

2: You know on row rowp stuff? Well, on the overall and skills pages, when it shows the players it only shows the first 2, row rowp1 and row rowp2, how would I make it go all the way to 22?

Hope you can help. Hiscores: http://sagescape.zapto.org (It redirects to 'em).
